modName: Better Khajiit male Texture for SOS body
summary: High resolution texture for SOS body.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][color=#6fa8dc]Description :[/color] [/size][/b][b][size=4][b][size=5] [/size][/b]Here is the complete set of textures for male Khajiit. Textures are high resolution. It is based on modified texture of MOD Lykaios Race  [/size][/b][size=4]by [/size][b][size=4]KrittaKitty [/size] [/b][b][size=4]combined with Khajiit male SOS textures by VectorPlexus and Smurf IIRC[/size][/b][b][size=4].[/size][/b][b][size=4] Texture of the face is a modified version of Coverkhajiits by mrLenski.
[b]
[/b][/size][/b][b][size=5][color=#6fa8dc]Installation :[/color] [/size] [/b][b][size=4]Possible is only manual installation.[/size][size=6] [/size][size=4]Extract the files, move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder (Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim).[/size]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Compatibility :[/size] [/color] [size=4]Textures are compatible only with SOS body.
[/size]
[/b][b][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Credits and thanks :[/size][/color][size=6] 
[/size][/b][b][size=4]KrittaKitty [/size][/b][b][size=4]for the amazing textures [/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64466/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64466/?
[/url][/size][font=Tahoma][size=4]VectorPlexus and Smurf  for best male body and textures[/size][/font]
[/b][b][size=4]mrLenski for best khajiit face texture [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5941/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5941/?[/url]
[/size][/b][size=4][b]zalunaya for great lioness look [/b][/size][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50802/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50802/?[/url]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Bethesda for Skyrim[/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=5]There is also a female version available here: [/size][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65943/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65943/?[/url][/size][/color][/b]
author: poblivion

files.name: Better Khajiit textures for SOS body
